sense.def:
The south-west
je smer na sredini med jugom in zahodom.

seg.quote: To the south-west lay the city.

sense.def:
The south-west
je tisti del nekega območja, ki leži proti jugozahodu.

seg.quote: ...the Conservative Party agent for South-west Staffordshire.

sense.def:
Izraz
south-west
pomeni v smeri proti jugozahodu ali jugozahodno od neke točke ali stvari.

seg.quote: It flows south-west to the Atlantic Ocean.

sense.def:
Veter, ki je
south-west
, piha z jugozahoda.
